attributes.action: Stop changing things for changes sake !
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This country is in a terrible mess becuase we have had 10 plus years of a Government who's only constant theme is to continually change things. Individuals, organisations and even Government cant keep up. Dont change things which are working, and only change things that are brocken.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
